remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您執行點擊測試、 裁剪，以及清除筆觸等功能。The enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes. 控制項執行許多這些函式，但是如果您需要更多的控制，比提供，提供更多選項。The control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the provides, the offers more options. 下表列出了解如何管理自訂控制項上的數位筆跡的位置。The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control. |若要這樣做...To do this…|請參閱本文章See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |建立會收集數位筆跡的控制項Create a control that collects digital ink|[建立筆墨輸入控制項Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)| |建立可讓使用者選取的筆墨的控制項Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[如何： 自訂控制項從選取的筆墨How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)| |建立控制項，讓使用者可以點選清除筆墨Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[如何： 清除筆墨上自訂控制項How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派，它會處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`applyToStylusTip`是`true`、方法會影響圖形的手寫筆提示，以及筆劃的位置。When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes. 例如，如果因為旋轉90 度，筆劃移動軸，而且高度和寬度的筆劃似乎會反轉。For example, if you rotate a 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何移動所有筆劃。The following example demonstrates how to move all the strokes on an . 這個範例假設有呼叫`inkCanvas1`。This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1`.
